Oakland.Alameda High School:
Alameda High School is a public coeducational high school serving grades 9-12. It is located in Alameda, California, United States, and is part of the Alameda Unified School District.


== History ==
It was at the Alameda Board of Education meeting held on March 6, 1874, that the suggestion to open a "Preparatory Department of a High School" was first presented.
